Class Inventory

    • item.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Ryan Luchs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory()
      Creates an empty Invetory of size 5
      Inventory(AbstractItem item)
      Creates an Inventory of size 1 from the given AbstractItem
      Inventory(AbstractItem[] items)
      Creates an Inventory from a given array of AbstractItems

      Swaps the item at the given index with the item of the given AbtractTile fails if the index is locked
